name: Conference Speaker and Microphone, 360° Omnidirectional USB Speakerphone Microphone with USB Hub, Noise Reduction/Echo Cancellation Computer Microphone for 8-10 People Business Conference, Home Office
short_description: HD Voice and Crystal Clear Sound: Q95mini USB speakerphone comes with 360° omnidirectional microphone and high-quality speaker, plus DSP technology which provides Acoustic Echo Cancellation (AEC) and Automatic Noise Suppression (ANS). This conference speaker and microphone combo are ideal for your business conference calls, online courses, meetings, chatting, etc.

360° Coverage: Omnidirectional microphone picks up voices from all directions to instantly transform any space at home or the office into a meeting room. And the best range of voice pick-up is up to 3 meters radius, no need to raise your voices all the time

Setup and Use with Ease: USB plug and play, with 3m (9.8ft) long cable, connecting to your computer without needing to install drivers. USB wired connection is stable. Quickly mute or unmute the conference microphone (DO NOT mute speaker) with the physical mute button
Built-in USB Hub: Q95mini is an innovative conference speakerphone built-in USB hub. It provides more convenience in connecting a mouse, keyboard, U-disk, handset and another conferencing system, etc

Universal Compatibility: Q95mini USB conference speaker and mic is compatible with leading systems like Windows 7-10/macOS and all popular online conferencing platforms, Zoom, Skype, Lync, Teams, WebEx, GotoMeeting, Facetime, Google Voice, eLearning and more

short_description: Officially Recognized Voice Tech - ZOOM has recognized EMEET OfficeCore M1A USB speakerphone as its compatible voice partner in its official website. Apart from ZOOM, the speaker and microphone works well with Skype, Skype for business, Microsoft Lync, Google Hangout, Facetime, Goto meeting, Bluejeans, Webex, etc.

All attendees’ voices are clearly picked due to the USB speakerphone’s 2 omnidirectional microphones which can cover your voice from 360° directions.

Smart Speaker & 9 Voice Volumes - The computer speaker with microphone has a smart speaker which can play sound in 9 volumes. The 9 volumes can be easily adjusted on the USB conference speaker’s control panel and can be easily judged via the blue LED light on its panel.

A wired connection promises the most stable connecting method. During the online meeting, your privacy will be validly protected by muting the speaker and microphone anytime and anywhere you want.

Multiple Using Scenes - The laptop microphone and speaker is broadly used in industries of business, education, government affairs, medical treatment and health, law community, etc. Professional computer speakers with microphone ensures effective voice transmission, making online calls smoother and hybrid meetings more efficient.

name: EMEET Conference Speaker and Microphone w/8+1 Mics, 360° Voice Pickup, Noise Reduce, Bluetooth/USB/Dongle Speakerphone for 14 People w/Daisy Chain for 25, Compatible w/Leading Platforms, 2025 Version
short_description: [8-Mic Speakerphone with a Satellite Mic] EMEET's first Bluetooth Speakerphone with a dedicated satellite Mic. The Luna Plus conference speakerphone itself already has an 8-omnidirectional-Mic array, which offers clear voice pickup for up to 10 people. With its dedicated satellite mic, the Luna Plus Kit offers a 360° ultra-wide voice pickup to a 14 people conference room, ensuring that every participant is heard loud and clear.

[Voice IA Noise Reduction Upgrade] The EMEET Luna Plus Meeting Kit conference speaker upgrades voice processing technology with the latest VoiceIA Algorithm which enables intelligent dynamic noise reduction. Say goodbye to background noise like air conditioning noise, and keyboard clicks, and focus on the conversation. With a full range of enhancement technologies such as full duplex technology and echo cancellation, the spokesperson ensures uninterrupted, no-echo conversations in any space.

[Flexible Daisy Chain for Up to 25 Attendees] With the flexible daisy chain feature, you can expand coverage for different scenarios such as boardrooms and conference halls. By daisy-chaining 2 Luna Plus Meeting Kit via the EMEET Daisy-Chain cable, you can support meetings of up to 25 attendees. The wired connection technology of the conference speaker ensures a stable and no-interference connection, unlike wireless options. (Daisy-chain cable must be purchased separately.

[5W Ultra-Clear Speaker & 10-Hour Call Time] Luna Plus Meeting Kit conference speaker comes with a long-lasting battery and a powerful, clear speaker. With a built-in 2600mAh battery, Luna Plus support 10-hour call time which can keep your all-day meeting on single charge. The 5W clear speaker is designed to provide crystal-clear voice quality, the maximum volume is increased to 89 dB, so you can communicate with confidence and ensure that your message is received loud and clear.

[Easy Set up & Broad Compatibility] The Bluetooth speakerphone can connect to various devices in seconds using USB 2.0, and Bluetooth 5.3, without the need for any drivers. The upgraded Dongle A350 offers a lightspeed connection and low latency for smooth real-time communication. The Bluetooth speaker is universally compatible with Windows, Mac OS, iOS, and Android, and works seamlessly with mainstream meeting platforms such as Zoom, Microsoft for Teams, Skype for Business, and more.

name: Jabra Speak2 55 Wireless Bluetooth Speakerphone - Portable Speaker with 4 Noise-Cancelling Mics, 50mm Full-Range Speakers & Wideband Audio - Certified Microsoft Teams Speaker - Dark Grey
short_description: MEET ANYWHERE, ANYTIME: Set up a meeting wherever you are with this easy-to-use Bluetooth portable speaker, ensuring you're always ready to connect; Certified for Microsoft Teams

LISTEN LIKE YOU'RE IN THE ROOM: Enjoy wideband audio in this wireless, Bluetooth speakerphone thanks to the powerful 50mm speaker that delivers clear, rich sound for every conversation, presentation or playlist
SPEAK LIKE YOU'RE IN THE ROOM: Full duplex audio in this Jabra conference speakerphone lets everyone talk and listen simultaneously, creating seamless and natural interactions

NO MORE BACKGROUND INTERRUPTIONS: Noise-cancelling microphones block out background noise, ensuring your voice is always heard loud and clear when using this Bluetooth Conference Speaker with Microphone

product_description: Our pocket-sized Jabra Speak2 55 Portable Speakerphone is designed for hybrid working. 50mm full-range speakers with wideband audio deliver powerful sound wherever you work best. Four ultra-modern beamforming microphones pick up sounds from all directions, whilst the noise-cancelling technology filters out background noises for crystal-clear conversations. Full duplex technology preserves the natural flow of face-to-face conversations, making this the perfect speakerphone for conference calls. Speak2 55 wireless Bluetooth speaker has the latest state-of-the-art Voice Level Normalization technology, which automatically equalizes voices to the same volume level so that everyone can be heard and speak naturally. Connect the Jabra speaker to your computer via the USB-C cable (with USB-A adapter) or connect the wireless speaker to your phone via Bluetooth 5.1. With a wireless range of up to 30m and 12 hours of battery life, you can operate freely while collaborating seamlessly. The speaker is also certified to work with Microsoft Teams. Additionally, Speak2 55 is water and dust resistant and comes with a 2-year warranty. Jabra Technology for life’s new rhythm. Whatever you’ve got going on, we’ve got the tech to help you do your thing.

short_description: HEAR AND BE HEARD: Multi-microphone design with echo and noise reduction keeps the focus on your voice no matter where you are in the room; plus, full duplex audio enables natural, simultaneous conversations without missing a word.

WORK ON THE GO: Keep your smartphone charged and ready using your Poly Sync 20 personal Bluetooth speakerphone, featuring up to 20 hours of battery life. It’s slim and portable, IP64 dust-and water-resistant, and comes with its own carrying case.
EASY CONNECTIVITY: Connect wirelessly to your smartphone or tablet using Bluetooth or to a PC or Mac using the USB-C (or USB-A using included USB-C to USB-A adapter) cable for a corded connection.

ALL IN ONE: This slim and portable speakerphone for conference calls is also a high-performance music speaker and smartphone charger. Enjoy superior clarity on every call thanks to the bass reflex system with dual passive sound amplification for natural voice and deep bass.

STAY IN CONTROL: Programmable button lets you quickly access your favorite functions on your Bluetooth and USB speakerphone, including play/pause music, last number redial, voice assistant, and more, while highly visible light bar lets you view call status, even from across the room.
product_description: Sound like the professional you are with the Poly Sync 20 USB / Bluetooth® speakerphone for remarkable conference calls and music anywhere. With its sleek, modern design and more than 20 hours of battery life, this personal Bluetooth and USB speakerphone is IP64 dust and water-resistant and comes with its own carrying case—perfect for working on the go all day long. It can even charge your smartphone! Zoom certified and compatible with Microsoft Teams and other conferencing platforms, the Poly Sync 20 portable speakerphone for conference calls provides an array of smart features that let you hear and be heard. A three-microphone array for echo and noise reduction keeps the focus on your voice, not the background noise, while full duplex audio enables natural, simultaneous conversations without missing a word. Enjoy more clarity on every call thanks to the bass reflex system with dual passive radiators for natural voice and deep bass. More than just a portable speakerphone, the Poly Sync 20 also delivers multimedia quality sound that is a music-lover’s delight. This personal Bluetooth speakerphone for computer and mobile devices lets you connect the way you want. Simply connect your smartphone or tablet wirelessly using Bluetooth or to a PC/Mac via USB-C or USB-A (via included USB-C to USB-A adapter) for a wired connection. Easy to use, the Poly Sync 20 features a programmable button that lets you quickly access your favorite functions, including play/pause music, last number redial, voice assistant, and more. The highly visible light bar lets you view the call status, even from across the room.

short_description: All-in-One Solution for Meetings: Sleek, compact, a complete meeting master. WaveLink serve as the ultimate duo for video conferences, providing ultra clear video & audio with smart speaker tracking and AI functionality.
Premium Image Quality: Capture every detail with an impressive 1/2"" sensor, balanced, true-to-life 4K visuals with HDR and exceptional low light performance for quality videos in any light.
Speaker Tracking: WaveLink can automatically identify and switch focus between speakers based on sound, providing immersive, high-quality face-to-face meetings.
Crystal-Clear Audio: Equipped with the latest in AI audio algorithms, Insta360 Wave eliminates environmental noises, cancels echo and reverberation.
3D 8-Mic Array & 16ft Voice Pickup: Equipped with 8 microphones, capture voices up to 16 ft away at a 48kHz premium sampling rate.
Seamless Set Up: Simply mount Link 2 on top of Wave, and it's ready to go. No complex components and instructions, get a capable all-in-one conference cam while saving your team headaches.

Plug and Play: Connect WaveLink and your PC with a USB-C cable, unlocking premium video and audio once you start a meeting. WaveLink is compatible with Zoom, Teams, Google Meet, and more (all mainstream platforms).

AI Recording: Insta360 WaveLink not only captures voices, it records and remembers. With full internal recording, no matter online or offline, make sure ideas are captured, then sync to the cloud for deeper analysis from Insta360 InSight.
AI Meeting Assistant: Integrates with the latest in AI. Get exclusive summaries from meetings, and ask AI for deeper analysis and insight right on the device.

In the Box: 1x Insta360 Wave, 1x Dongle, 1x 1.5m USB-C Cable, 1x USB-A to USB-C Adapter, 1x Carry Bag, 1x Insta360 Link 2, 1x Magnetic Mount, 4x Recognition Markers, 1x USB-C Cable, 1x USB-C to USB-A Adapter

name: EMEET Conference Speaker and Microphone Luna 360° Voice Pickup w/Noise Reduction/Mute/Indicator USB Bluetooth Speakerphone w/Dongle for 8 People Daisy Chain for 16 Compatible with Leading Software
short_description: [VoiceIA Noise Reduction Technology] The EMEET Luna conference speaker and microphone feature the exclusive upgraded VoiceIA tech, eliminating background noise such as air conditioning noise, keyboard clicks, and general background noise. This advanced noise-cancellation technology makes the computer speaker with microphone a must-have device in your home office. Experience a different kind of effective remote meeting!

[Ultra-clear Sound & Speech Enhancement] With the auto-vocal-increase function, EMEET Luna Bluetooth speaker is able to identify the distance of the sound source, automatically adjust the sound volume to achieve self-volume balance, and provide a smooth call experience. The Bluetooth speaker with microphone can help you get rid of the headache of wearing headphones for a long time. The maximum volume was increased to 85 dB, making the conference speaker easy to apply to a larger conference room.

[Multi-Microphone Array & 360° Pickup] CNET has recognized EMEET Luna as "One of the Best Speakerphones of 2023 for Working from Home”. The conference speaker, equipped with 3 microphone arrays, achieves 360 ° voice pickup. Instantly turn your home into a conference room and enjoy an immersive meeting experience. The Bluetooth speakerphone was made to be full-duplex ensuring that you can talk as much as you want on your remote conference calls and have a smooth calling experience.

[Daisy Chain for Up to 16 Attendees] Connect 2 Luna conference speakers with EMEET's special cable to easily work well in small meetings (under 8 attendees) and medium to large meetings (up to 16 or more attendees). Compared to a wireless connection, Luna's wired connection technology is more stable from environmental interference. (Daisy-chain cable must be purchased separately. ASIN: B087G5MFN1) It will automatically shut off when not used after one hour for battery life-saving.

[Easy to Connect & Youthful Design] USB, Bluetooth, AUX, and Dongle Connection are all your options to connect the Bluetooth speaker to your devices. No driver is needed; just plug and play. It is also compatible with various platforms, including Zoom, Skype for Business, WebEx, etc. The conference speaker adopted an advanced sandblasting process to make a full-metal and matte-colored casing. The dongle slot and portable design allow you to hold a meeting anywhere you want.
